sourcesContent:
import '../styles/ProjectCard.css'; export default function ProjectCard({ darkMode }) { const projects = [ { image: "https://film-fanatic-eta.vercel.app/assets/banner.jpeg", title: "Film Fanatic", description: "A responsive movie app to search and view details of your favorite films.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=react,ts,tailwind,vercel", liveLink: "https://film-fanatic-eta.vercel.app", codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/FilmFanatic" }, { image: "https://analizador-lexico-web.vercel.app/logo192.png", title: "Analizador Léxico", description: "An online lexical analyzer built with React for educational purposes.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=react,js,vercel", liveLink: "https://analizador-lexico-web.vercel.app/", codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/analizador-lexico-web" }, { image: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/poncho-ajmv/Metaheurisitcas_With_Python/main/metaheuristics.png", title: "Metaheurísticas Python", description: "Implementación de algoritmos metaheurísticos clásicos como búsqueda local y recocido simulado.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=python,jupyter", liveLink: null, codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/Metaheurisitcas_With_Python" }, { image: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/poncho-ajmv/EvaluadorExpresionesGUI/main/preview.png", title: "Evaluador de Expresiones GUI", description: "Evaluador de expresiones matemáticas infijas en una interfaz gráfica simple con Python.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=python,tkinter", liveLink: null, codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/EvaluadorExpresionesGUI" } ]; return (
{projects.map((project, index) => (

{project.title}

{project.description}

{project.liveLink && ( Live )} Code
))}
); }
